infos.value: All right, you two.
I'm going to draw their fire.
That's absurd.
And you cowards will do your cowardly thing.
Shoot them down starting with their commander, Rhaldor!
Without him to lead them, the rest will be easy!
...You heard the man.
No. We should retreat.
You're too soft.
Your sole weakness is that you worry too much about your comrades.
You need to learn that doing so actually ends up putting them in danger.
But Commander...
What happened to the cruelty you showed that hostage monk back there?
Now, charge!
I can't. Using you as a shield would be...
What exactly do you fight for?
Huh...?
I heard from Ellshra.
Heard that you declared yourself prepared to accept anything for Lord Jayden's sake.
I did.
If we yield the Crystals to them here, the Crystal Sanctum will become an even more formidable presence.
You get it now? That would mean putting Lord Jayden in harm's way.
Commander...
Move out! Let them experience the pride of «Crucium»!
Yes, sir!
